aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hey there! How are you? My name is Mateus Oliveira (or maybe Mateus Gonzaga or even Mateus Jos√©, I really need to decide which one to use, haha). I'm 20 years old and I'm a Front-End developer. I started venturing into the world of web development on my own around the end of 2022. Since I was a child, I've always been fascinated by computers and astronomy, always wondering: "how do these machines think?" Oh, and I can't forget to mention that I have two kittens and a crazy dog (well, at least she's not really crazy, hehe). They keep me company during my long hours of coding!

projects: In this section of the website, you will find a selection of my works and experiences. It's a sample of what I have done and learned so far. Feel free to explore and get to know me a little better. And to see more of my projects, visit my Github.

projects.name: First portfolio idea
projects.description: This was my first portfolio idea, it's basically a game where the idea was to walk through the map and see the sections of the site. Although it's quite creative, I thought it would be complicated for users to use. Not everyone has the time to walk around a game map. I learned a lot, really a lot, from this project, as I had to use a library with terrible documentation.

projects.name: Piano simulator
projects.description: It was one of the tests from freeCodeCamp, but since I don't like doing simple things, I went beyond the piano and also created a drum set. The idea was to have a retro feel. It was my first contact with React and I learned a lot.

projects.name: Markdown viewer
projects.description: It's basically a code viewer, where you write code on one side and the rendered output appears on the other side. It's like the GitHub Readme.

projects.name: Quote generator
projects.description: My first encounter with an API, which in this case uses Axios to make a request to the quotes API.
